document.full_text: the islamist group hamas that controls the gaza strip said wednesday it was seeking to reverse a recent spike in violence with israel that has claimed the lives of 11 palestinians and one israeli.
document.title: hamas says seeking to lower tensions with israel
lines_and_colors: the islamist group hamas that controls the gaza strip said wednesday it was seeking to reverse a recent spike in violence with israel that has claimed the lives of 11 palestinians and one israeli.
